verses.verse: Let as <S%G3745>many<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> as are <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G2218>yoke<s%> <S%G2233>count<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1203>masters<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> that the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and his <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> be not <S%G987>blasphemed.<s%>

And they that <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4103>believing<s%> <S%G1203>masters,<s%> let them not <S%G2706>despise<s%> them, <S%G3754>because<s%> they are <S%G80>brothers;<s%> but <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G1398>do<s%> them <S%G1398>service,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they are <S%G4103>faithful<s%> and <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G482>partakers<s%> of the <S%G2108>benefit.<s%> <S%G5023>These<s%> things <S%G1321>teach<s%> and <S%G3870>exhort.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G2085>teach<s%> <S%G2085>otherwise,<s%> and <S%G4334>consent<s%> not to <S%G5198>wholesome<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> even the words of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and to the <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> which is <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G2150>godliness;<s%>

He is <S%G5187>proud,<s%> <S%G1987>knowing<s%> <S%G3367>nothing,<s%> but <S%G3552>doting<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2214>questions<s%> and <S%G3055>strifes<s%> of <S%G3055>words,<s%> <S%G1537>whereof<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1096>comes<s%> <S%G5355>envy,<s%> <S%G2054>strife,<s%> <S%G988>railings,<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G5283>surmisings,<s%>

<S%G3859>Perverse<s%> <S%G3859>disputings<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> of <S%G1311>corrupt<s%> <S%G3563>minds,<s%> and <S%G650>destitute<s%> of the <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3543>supposing<s%> that <S%G4200>gain<s%> is <S%G2150>godliness:<s%> from <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G868>withdraw<s%> yourself.
But <S%G2150>godliness<s%> with <S%G841>contentment<s%> is <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4200>gain.<s%>

For we <S%G1533>brought<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> and it is <S%G1212>certain<s%> we <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1627>carry<s%> <S%G3761>nothing<s%> <S%G5100><s%> out.
And <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1305>food<s%> and <S%G4629>raiment<s%> let us be <S%G5125>therewith<s%> <S%G714>content.<s%>

But they that <S%G1014>will<s%> be <S%G4147>rich<s%> fall <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3986>temptation<s%> and a <S%G3803>snare,<s%> and <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G453>foolish<s%> and <S%G983>hurtful<s%> <S%G1939>lusts,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1036>drown<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> in <S%G3639>destruction<s%> and <S%G684>perdition.<s%>

For the <S%G5365>love<s%> of <S%G5365>money<s%> is the <S%G4491>root<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2556>evil:<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> while <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G3713>coveted<s%> after, they have <S%G635>erred<s%> from the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and <S%G4044>pierced<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G4044>through<s%> with <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3601>sorrows.<s%>

But you, O <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things; and <S%G1377>follow<s%> after <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2150>godliness,<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G5281>patience,<s%> <S%G4236>meekness.<s%>

<S%G75>Fight<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G73>fight<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1949>lay<s%> <S%G1949>hold<s%> <S%G1949>on<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G1519>whereunto<s%> <S%G3739><s%> you are <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2564>called,<s%> and have <S%G3670>professed<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3671>profession<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses.<s%>

I give you <S%G3853>charge<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2227>vivifies<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and before <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4194>Pontius<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3140>witnessed<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3671>confession;<s%>

That you <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G784>without<s%> <S%G784>spot,<s%> <S%G423>unrebukable,<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> the <S%G2015>appearing<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> in his <S%G5550>times<s%> he shall <S%G1166>show,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is the <S%G3107>blessed<s%> and <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1413>Potentate,<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G936>kings,<s%> and <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G2961>lords;<s%>

<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G110>immortality,<s%> <S%G3611>dwelling<s%> in the <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> man can <S%G676>approach<s%> to; <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> has <S%G1492>seen,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1492>see:<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> be <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G2904>power<s%> <S%G166>everlasting.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G3853>Charge<s%> them that are <S%G4145>rich<s%> in <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3568><s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> that they be not high <S%G5309>minded,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G1679>trust<s%> in <S%G83>uncertain<s%> <S%G4149>riches,<s%> but in the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G3930>gives<s%> us <S%G4146>richly<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things to <S%G619>enjoy;<s%>

That they <S%G14>do<s%> <S%G14>good,<s%> that they be <S%G4147>rich<s%> in <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G2130>ready<s%> to <S%G2130>distribute,<s%> <S%G2843>willing<s%> to <S%G2843>communicate;<s%>

<S%G597>Laying<s%> up in <S%G597>store<s%> for <S%G1438>themselves<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G3195>time<s%> to <S%G3195>come,<s%> that they may <S%G1949>lay<s%> <S%G1949>hold<s%> <S%G1949>on<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

O <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> <S%G5442>keep<s%> that which is <S%G3872>committed<s%> to your trust, <S%G1624>avoiding<s%> <S%G952>profane<s%> and <S%G2757>vain<s%> <S%G2757>babblings,<s%> and <S%G477>oppositions<s%> of <S%G1108>science<s%> <S%G5581>falsely<s%> so <S%G5581>called:<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1861>professing<s%> have <S%G795>erred<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G4102>faith.<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be with you. <S%G281>Amen.<s%> The first to Timothy was written from Laodicea, which is the chiefest city of Phrygia Pacatiana.
